resources.string: On the display at the centre of the web there are three spiders, ready to hide along the branches of the web.
Pay attention to the leds which light up: they will show the path of their same color spider.
When the leds turn off, it means that the spiders hid into one of the hubs. Drag the spider on the right hub and, when you\'re done, submit your answer.
If you guess right where the spiders are hiding, you win. Have fun trying more difficult levels, increasing the speed of the spiders.
Fill the form below with the IP address of the web in order to begin to play.
